Text: Fw Enron Former Employee SitesFor your information Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet Original Message From Courtney John P To Runnels David Spiers Jeffrey Sent Thu Dec Subject Enron Former Employee Sites I noticed that some of the former employees have put up web sites wwwenronxorg While none of them seem too nasty at this point I wanted you to know that we have experience in dealing with disgruntled employees who put up disparaging and infringing sites JPC

Wednesday Astros GameI have my tickets in Row Section available for Wednesdays game I have a conflict and would be pleased if any of you could use them for you or your people Game time is Let me know as soon as you can Go Astros
Hoops Saturday NightJust confirming that you have the tickets We are looking forward to seeing you guys Saturday night

Lunchjust realized I have a conflict for lunch on June so lets go with Thursday June if thats OK Barbara just let me know at your convenience if that date works for you and Ill make the reservation Looking forward to it Thanks

Lunchjust realized I have a conflict for lunch on June so lets go with Thursday June if thats OK Barbara just let me know at your convenience if that date works for you and Ill make the reservation Looking forward to it Thanks

Read Richard will not be able to attend dinner tonight I also left you a voice messageYour message To Runnels David Subject Richard will not be able to attend dinner tonight I also left you a voice message Sent Wed Dec was read on Wed Dec CDTF

Dinner WednesdayWe are set for at Pappas Steakhouse Let me know if youd like to bring anyone else Ill ask some others if I bump into them with the idea of keeping this low key Spiers andor Baumfeld look like they will be joining us as well

Toronto GameI have excellent seats Section th row center court for the Tuesday March game against Toronto It will be worth seeing Vince Carter and Hakeem from those seats even if the Rockets are games out of first place by then Let me know if you have any interest in joining me
